help.description: Get a helpful message from LinkFix!
help.content:
LinkFix works automagically! Just invite the bot to your server, make sure it has permission to read and send messages, and it will automatically respond with fixed links for you!

__Available Commands__
- `/invite`: Get a URL to invite LinkFix to your server.
- `/vote`: If you enjoy LinkFix, please consider voting for the bot on Top.gg! :grinning:
- `/help`: This is the one you're looking at right now!

If you are having trouble with the bot, please open an issue here: {{issuesLink}}

invite.content:
You can use this link to add LinkFix to your server:
{{inviteLink}}

vote.content:
If you enjoy LinkFix, please consider voting for the bot on Top.gg!
{{voteLink}}
